name: MoneyMaker
description:
This is a clicker game like AdventureCapitalist and Cookieclicker.

You can find the scripts used to build this game here : https://github.com/cadenburleson/My-Unity3D-Script...

I will soon consolidate the scripts and make a tutorial explaining how to make this game once I fix a few more things like :

-Buying a manager subtractes the cost from the players money.
